content.prompt: Which of the following would be the best measure to use to determine the effectiveness of the rain gardens in reducing the impact of urban runoff?

choices.label: The size and shape of the rain gardens
The intensity and duration of the storm event
The speed and volume of the water exiting the gardens
The temperature of the parking lot and the roof

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
